product.name: Elden Ring
product.description: Elden Ring is an action role-playing game played in a third person perspective, with gameplay focusing on combat and exploration; it features elements similar to those found in other games developed by FromSoftware, such as the Souls series, Bloodborne, and Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice.

product.name: Gran Turismo 7
product.description: Gran Turismo 7 (commonly abbreviated as GT7) is a racing video game developed by Polyphony Digital and published by Sony Interactive Entertainment. It is the eighth major release, the fourteenth game overall in the Gran Turismo video game series, the second game to be released on the PlayStation 4 and the first on PlayStation 5.[1] The game was released on the 4th of March, 2022, on both consoles.

product.name: FIFA 22 PS5
product.description: Loaded with football. EA SPORTS™ FIFA 22 on PlayStation®5 takes it to the next level with Hypermotion's cutting-edge, innovative technology that makes every moment of the match unforgettable. By integrating advanced team-wide motion capture data and machine learning, HyperMotion technology takes every match in FIFA 22 to the next level, utilizing the performance of next-generation consoles to create the most realistic, controllable and fluid gameplay experience ever. FIFA 22 is a new season of innovation in every mode: experience greater stability and focus in the final frontier with new goalkeeping behaviors, make your soccer dreams come true and lead your own club to glory in Career Mode, show off your fine technique in VOLTA FOOTBALL, meet the most memorable football players as FIFA Ultimate Team™ Heroes and experience the most immersive game in EA SPORTS FIFA history.

product.name: Death's Door
product.description: Reaping souls of the dead and punching a clock might get monotonous but it's honest work for a Crow. The job gets lively when your assigned soul is stolen and you must track down a desperate thief to a realm untouched by death - where creatures grow far past their expiry.

product.name: Deathloop
product.description: DEATHLOOP is a next-gen FPS from Arkane Lyon, the award-winning studio behind Dishonored. In DEATHLOOP, two rival assassins are trapped in a mysterious timeloop on the island of Blackreef, doomed to repeat the same day for eternity.

product.name: Grand Theft Auto: The...
product.description: Play the genre-defining classics of the original Grand Theft Auto Trilogy: Grand Theft Auto III, Grand Theft Auto: Vice City, and Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas updated for a new generation, now with across-the-board enhancements including brilliant new lighting and environmental upgrades, with high-resolution textures, increased draw distances, Grand Theft Auto V-style controls and targeting, and much more, bringing these beloved worlds to life with all new levels of detail.

product.name: Call of Duty®: Vanguard...
product.description: Rise on every front: Dogfight over the Pacific, airdrop over France, defend Stalingrad with a sniper’s precision and blast through advancing forces in North Africa. The Call of Duty® franchise returns with Call of Duty®: Vanguard, developed by Sledgehammer Games, where players will be immersed in visceral WWII combat on an unprecedented global scale.

product.name: First Class Trouble
product.description: First Class Trouble is an multiplayer party game that blends cooperation and deception as players try to figure out who they can trust, while they fight to survive aboard a luxury space cruise-liner that’s had an A.I. uprising.

product.name: Demon's Souls
product.description: From PlayStation Studios and Bluepoint Games comes a remake of the PlayStation classic, Demon’s Souls. Entirely rebuilt from the ground up and masterfully enhanced, this remake introduces the horrors of a fog-laden, dark fantasy land to a whole new generation of gamers. Those who’ve faced its trials and tribulations before, can once again challenge the darkness in stunning visual quality with incredible performance.

product.name: Ghost of Tsushima Director’s Cut
product.description: If you already own Ghost of Tsushima on PS4™, you can pre-order an upgrade to the Ghost of Tsushima DIRECTOR’S CUT on PS4 for $19.99 from 29 June 2021. This upgrade will be available from 20 August 2021.

product.name: Marvel's Spider-Man: Miles Morales
product.description: In the latest adventure in the Marvel’s Spider-Man universe, teenager Miles Morales is adjusting to his new home while following in the footsteps of his mentor, Peter Parker, as a new Spider-Man.

product.name: Saints Row
product.description: The US President must save the Earth from alien overlord Zinyak using an arsenal of superpowers and strange weapons in the wildest open world game ever.

product.name: Horizon Forbidden West™...
product.description: Horizon Forbidden West is one of Sony's flagship games for 2022. This sequel to the smash hit Horizon Zero Dawn is here, and fans of Aloy and her robo-dino-destroying exploits have another epic action RPG to enjoy. In this Horizon Forbidden West guide, we're going to answer some common questions about Horizon Forbidden West so you can stay informed about the game.

product.name: Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy...
product.description: Pre-order Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy to get the Guardians of the Galaxy Costume Pack early. You will immediately unlock one costume for each of the Guardians of the Galaxy - we have reflected the iconic images of comic book characters in them.

product.name: Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order™
product.description: A galaxy-spanning adventure awaits in Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order, a 3rd person action-adventure title from Respawn. An abandoned Padawan must complete his training, develop new powerful Force abilities, and master the art of the lightsaber - all while staying one step ahead of the Empire.

product.name: eFootball™ 2022
product.description: From 'PES' to 'eFootball™' A new era of digital football has begun!

product.name: Tiny Tina's Wonderlands…
product.description: Create your own hero from multiple classes and shoot, slash, slash for loot to be taken from incredible monsters and found deep in the dungeons to stop the merciless Dragon Lord. Everyone is welcome here, so join the party, put on your adventure boots, and show off your Chaotic Cool character!

product.name: Sifu
product.description: Sifu is the new game from Sloclap, the independent studio behind Absolver. A third-person action game with intense hand-to-hand combat that puts you in control of a young kung fu student who has chosen the path of revenge.

product.name: Resident Evil Village
product.description: Experience survival horror like never before in the 8th major installment in the Resident Evil franchise - Resident Evil Village. With detailed graphics, intense first-person action and masterful storytelling, the terror has never felt more realistic.
